name: Re Watch
description:
5 minute walking sim with minor psychological horror stuff, mainly went for the eerie look, made in a week so don't expect much, still tried my best.

As for the story, find out yourself :)...

Note:
-minor jumpscare and spooky stuff (it's a horror game)
-Small seizure stuff (TV Static screen zoomed in)
-Nauseating  camera (you can't turn them off)

Credit:
-Surgery room by Epilogueronin ( https://skfb.ly/ooVYM )
-Models from Poly Haven and Blend Swap
-Textures from textures.com
-Sounds from freesound.org
-Human model from Mixamo
-Trees generated using MTree addon for blender
